Title: Once a Langmore...
Writer: Bill Dubuque (created by), Alyson Feltes, Mark Williams (created by), Ning Zhou (staff writer)
Actors: Jason Bateman, Laura Linney, Sofia Hublitz, Skylar Gaertner
Plot: Wendy does damage control when Wilkes's pressure on Sen. Blake backfires. Rachel is sent on a mission. Ruth resists accepting her Langmore destiny.
